limitActionsToCantrips.Label: Limit Actions to Cantrips
limitActionsToCantrips.Hint: Instead of showing all spells that deal damage in the Actions tab/panel, limit it to only cantrips. This is the default D&DBeyond behavior.

includeOneMinuteSpells.Label: Include Minute-long Spells as Actions
includeOneMinuteSpells.Hint: Include spells with a duration of one minute and an activation time of 1 Action or 1 Bonus Action in the Actions tab/panel.

includeConsumables.Label: Include Consumables as Actions
includeConsumables.Hint: Include consumables which have an activation type (Action, Bonus Action, etc) in the Actions list.
